title: CASP Solutions for Planning in Hybrid Domains
abstract: CASP is an extension of ASP that allows for numerical constraints to be added in the rules. PDDL+ is an extension of the PDDL standard language of automated planning for modeling mixed discrete-continuous dynamics.
histories: Under consideration in Theory and Practice of Logic Programming (TPLP)
COMMENTS: Under consideration in Theory and Practice of Logic Programming (TPLP)
